website_summaries.verdict: Once features like geo-fencing, pattern-learning algorithms and triggers become available, this oddly standard Thermostat could become a strong contender at its price point. For now, though, it's not worth the money.
pros: The body of the Thermostat looks nice enough, and the instructions for setup are clear and helpful
Between coming HomeKit and iDevices software upgrades, this could be one of better thermostats for its price
cons: The design ends up feeling inefficient, and the interface raises usability problems
Worst of all, this Thermostat includes surprisingly few smart features at present, making its price tag inappropriate

customer_reviews.title: Works maybe 10% of the time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve grown increasingly frustrated with this product. For a time, it worked approximately 50% of the time, now it connects maybe 1 in 100 times. I’ve submitted several tickets & have spent time talking with reps from the company with no real resolution to the issue. I feel that it is just a faulty product, which is a shame because it would be awesome if it worked! I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband and we’ve had nothing but issues with it from day 1. I wish the return policy was better, this would go straight back.
customer_reviews.author: wdhutch

customer_reviews.title: I have had a smart thermostat for 5 years now but it wasn’t Apple ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a smart thermostat for 5 years now but it wasn’t Apple HomeKit capable. So decided to order this one because I didn’t want anything super sophisticated like the brands out there and expensive. Setting up this thermostat was super simple and love how basic yet advanced it is. The app is very easy to use and it’s completely compatible with Apple HomeKit. I have been using iDevices switches and outlets for sometime now and that’s what made me pick this thermostat over the others. Works perfectly and would definitely recommend to anyone who would like an easy to use smart thermostat with just the right amount of features.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: HomeKit hassles have me hexed
customer_reviews.text: This device has serious HomeKit issues, so if you are in the Apple ecosystem, this is not a bargain. It disconnects and is a bit of a crap shoot on how long it will take you to get it reconnected. When it works, it is pretty decent. No AI learning, just a temperature with a tolerance setting for degrees above or below. There are enough settings to make this a promising bargain find, if it would work consistently. It provides current and target temperature to HomeKit as well as humidity. When it works. Mine is in a box.
customer_reviews.author: MrZ

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 5 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly from install until it didn't! It did the normal "click" when it was calling for heat but it would actually trigger the furnace. It's 100% the thermostat as the furnace can be triggered by bypassing the thermostat all together. I called iDevice and they were happy to take care me under warranty. Wasn't surprised by that considering it only 5 weeks old. I started the warranty process and then I got an email stating because it was purchased through Amazing Deals here on Amazon, it wasn't covered. Wasted money for sure. I'm disappointed it worked well until it did't.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Returned device due to connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the device kept disconnecting from the network, requiring a hard reset in order to reconnect. Attempted this multiple times without any permanent success. Ended up returning the device and purchased an ecobee.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Router Compatibility,Check first
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to install this device with the help of a HVAC technician. We went through all of the steps without success. Called customer service and they were great. Tech walked us through the process , but without success. Then the Idevices technician asked us to check the router brand supplied by the ISP ( Verizon) and found it was NOT supported by Idevices. A lot of work and expense to find this at the end of the process.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Bodine

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: May be cheaper than most. But it kept turning on and off. All I did was get frustrated with it. Tried everything I could, even thinking I'm installing the wrong wires for it and I wasn't. I seen the reviews on here and I thought I would give it a try. But everyone is right about this thermostat. It's a horrible product and should be taken off the market and amazon. Especially if it's wasting everyone's time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Heather

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a month
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a month and now will not connect to wifi. It does not work unless it is connected to wifi. Luckily it is a cooler day so we are fine without AC. I tried every workaround provided and got nothing. Will not buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Powell

customer_reviews.title: Have to reset it often
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it works. But at least two or three times per week the thermostat is totally unresponsive, and we have to pull the thermostat off it's base on the wall for a minute and attach it again. About half the time, it starts right back up. The other half, we have to repeat this process one or two times until it finally wakes up. The price of this is good, but the main reason I chose this was because it's Apple HomeKit approved. I wish I would have saved my money toward a Nest or any other brand product for all the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Blyth

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to hook up two of these now and can't get them to turn on at all. Where the pins go into the mount where the wires are is a bad design. Power goes to the screws but not into the terminal for some reason. After the problem with the first one customer service told me it must be a bad unit. Now after the second one i have to say its a very bad cheap design. I will not buy another idevice ever again. Off to Home Depot in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable smart thermostat!
customer_reviews.text: Having the ability to remotely control the temperature of your home is mind blowing, welcome to the new world where homes become smart, this is awesome! You do have to go in deep in the settings and select what kind of furnace your unit has, I struggled for a while because I didn’t know what ours was so I couldn’t get it to blow cool air until I asked a friend who knows about A/C units and told me that I had to tell the thermostat that our furnace is electric and it wasn’t until then when I finally got it to work properly. Cool air, blessed be!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Veal

customer_reviews.title: Good HomeKit thermostat at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Siri integration is pretty good, the controls are good and responsive.0 It was pretty easy to install for me. Not trying to show-off but it took me around 15 mins to take my 2016 Honeywell (non HomeKit supported) thermostat off and get this up and running...just sayin it’s pretty straight forward. I took a picture of of where the wired were plugged into the other thermostat and then I just plugged the wires into the same position onto this one. I will be changing my 2018 Nest soon because goggle took away the Apple Watch app..ugh.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful design. However, its limitation on connectivity and the poorly crafted ad make it less desirable. Installation is like any other. Transfer wires, plug in. Configuration may be conflated with "Easy to install", but we'll report on that later ( if I install it ). It appears it is incompatible with Android or browser control. I've gotten conflicting responses on this, so it will take an experience to determine which is correct.
customer_reviews.author: whocares

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Integrates with google home so you can control it with voice commands like " turn the heat up". Install was also easy. O ly negative thing I have to say is that's their app makes it a little hard to figure out how to reconnect to wifi if you ever change your password.
customer_reviews.author: Lious Friend

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t have the wire to run power to the unit. Only disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give a well described review as I didn’t have the electricity wire available to install as my original one was ran on batteries, and I didn’t have the funds to hire an electrician to come over and re-wire for this, so I had to send it back. But the IT support was awesome. They tried to help but found I only had 2 wires an RH and W wire. So I had to return it. Which was ok. I was bummed I couldn’t use it as I wanted to have a wireless thermostat to work from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bruley-Marchessault

customer_reviews.title: I tried to make it work
customer_reviews.text: THE GOOD: easy to install & setup. Good tech support. THE BAD: you can only setup one user to control the thermostat using the app; the tolerance is greater than two degrees, which means if you set it to 65 at night, it will have to hit 62 before the heat comes on; the display turns off almost immediately, so all that info at a glance goes away ... things to think about. Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.author: The Renisaunce Man

customer_reviews.title: Great, but only goes down to 50 degrees
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat is easy to setup, works with Siri, almost instantly I was controlling the temperature of my shop with my watch, no extra stuff to setup. My two downsides: the lowest the thermostat goes is 50 degrees. My previous non-Wi-Fi one would go to 40. That’s where I prefer to keep my shop. Second, it seems to run warm. 65 degrees on this thermostat feels like 70 on my other one. But there IS an adjustment for that, I just haven’t gotten to that part yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Super easy set up, great build quality, works extremely well with Apple HomeKit and Siri
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed - iDevices have never let me down. Build quality is GREAT and setup though Apple HomeKit was absolutely seamless. The set up instructional videos were extremely helpful which made set up very easy - I was very lucky to have a common wire stashed in my furnace. Thermostat works great it was a great improvement over my old 1990s thermostat and I feel like if he calls the house a lot more efficiently I would highly recommend works great with Apple HomeKit. Definitely upgrades the look of your thermostat
customer_reviews.author: Mac Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Simple and smart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this smart thermostat for my detached garage, where I have a shop heater. I was able to connect it to control the propane heater so I can control it with wifi using my phone, which is fantastic. I do wish it were possible to set the temperature lower than 50 degrees, however. During the cold Minnesota winter months it would be nice to have the option to set it at 45 degrees to save propane, if I'm not going to be working in the shop. Other than that, I have been very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pike

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this Thermostat because you won't get it to work outside US & Canada
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Thermostat for mu American Godman HVAC system, I live outside US and tried for 2 years to get support for the thermostat, at iDevices they worried along, apologies stating that on the advertisement they say only support in UD, BUT they don't say that the whole system BLOCKED on purpose, so things like "Works with Alexa" is fake because Alexa works in my home perfectly and this iDevice won't work with Alexa here. I am going to post a complaint on Amazon on this! (Amazon don't warn you either before you buy it)
customer_reviews.author: Andres Hohendahl

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: After several attempts to connect with Alexa I have given up. The phone app works flawless after set up. I am happy. Would recommend. (I'm not sure how Alexa could handle the over ride feature anyway, which is the only thing for Alexa to do since the thermostat is on a preset schedule that the user programs.)
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After installation it was easy to setup and set temperature. Unfortunately the thermostat keeps getting colder and colder than the set temperature. I’ve carefully gone through the settings both on the app and the actual thermostat but it’s no use. It will work for a few hours then it resets itself to a much colder temperature until I have to shut it off
customer_reviews.author: Christoph65

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Linksys
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't work with my wifi. They listed one particular model of Linksys router that wasn't compatible with the thermostat, which isn't mine, but my router is evidently not compatible either. If you have a Linksys, I would pass on this device. I just dropped it off at UPS to go back.
customer_reviews.author: goose32373

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is a great thermostat for the price range. I usually aim for the more expensive smart gadgets, and have had the Nest on my wish list, but decided to get this one instead. Perhaps, the Nest is a "better" thermostat, but if you're upgrading from a simple non-wifi capable thermostat then this is like gold. In the end, the satisfaction of saving a couple hundred dollars and still being able to control my thermostat from my bedroom is worth it. I'll be happy if this thermostat lasts for a few years, and then it'll be a decision of another one like this or the leading products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Soares

customer_reviews.title: Great connected thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I had some issues configuring it properly, so make sure you know what kind of system you are dealing with. I live in an apartment, so I had to talk to maintenance to see what kind of system I had. Other than that, fantastic thermostat, especially for the money! I love being able to control & see my thermostat status remotely
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit if you want you set temp below 50 degrees
customer_reviews.text: The first unit was doa. Calling support is a joke. It says 4 min wait, but after 10 min or so it has you leave a vm. Support doesn’t call back until next day, after you have uninstalled and are nowhere near your thermostat. The support team is EXTREMELY NICE AND KNOWLEDGABLE, just not available when you need them. They replaced my unit and it worked fine, except that the lowest heat setting is 50 degrees. I bought this for a man cave/shop, just wanting to keep it from freezing, and being able to turn it up before i plan to be there. 50 degrees cost me $188 last month in natural gas. Nice product, just doesn’t fit my application.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good smart thermostats for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far works with the limitation mentioned by others. One disappointment was the quality of the wire terminal screws. Had difficulty tightening them on the wires and one would not loosen when I wanted to remove a wire. Would like the option to have the display visible all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Works as Advertized
customer_reviews.text: Product installs fairly easily and operates very nicely. Price point of under $70 is about right. Does not stick out on the wall as a "woo, look at me look at me, I'm a gadget" which I like. Just blends. There is nothing better than "Hey Siri, cool it down" or "He Siri, what is the setting on the thermostat upstairs?" etc.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cerniuk

customer_reviews.title: Saves me money
customer_reviews.text: Had a friend put it in foot 50 bucks cause I Judy didn't have time to mess around with it. With time I am confident I could do myself. It took him 15 mins. My light boil I'm general has gone down 10 to 15 a month immediately since installing.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Mistelske

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had it now about 2 months with no issues. Works great with the idevice app bit basic anduseless with Alexa though. You can tell it to set the temperature and ask the temperature but that's really about it. To switch between heating and coolingyou need to use the manufacturer's app.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I have two now, one for the upstairs and one for our downstairs. Works great, I’ve got multiple schedules for different days of the week and times, and I like the ability to change the setting while not in the house. It was a bit of a challenge setting up the first one, but after 3 days of emailing pictures of my control board to their customer service, and a little trial and error instructions from them, got it working perfectly! It was a new customer service experience for me, and I must say that the delays in email response were on me, not them as they were quick to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Allysen Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a Year before I had to replace on a Sunday with temperatures sitting at 12 degrees!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the first week of January last year and it only lasted a year before it started to constantly reboot. When the outside temperature dips to 12 degrees, you need a thermostat. Needless to say, I wasn't happy that it fizzled out on a Sunday just before the hardware store closed! Several times through the year, I had to reset it either on my phone or my wife's phone. Never really worked like advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everyone suggested a different smart thermostat but I didn’t want to spend that much. Once I got this wired in, it has been everything I expected. I have two issues with it though. 1) the app is finicky 2) the thermostat only connects to a g network. It took a long time to sync my phone due to the network thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These thing suck and when you return them they hold your money for days after they get it back in their Possession
customer_reviews.author: Brian Young

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine with Alexa - but limited
customer_reviews.text: Easy as pie to install, setup prompts guide you assuming you have it wired correctly. Alexa does indeed control the thermostat - for setpoint control only. No Mode control, status of room temp only. That's ok because with an Alexa routine with a Wait function you can have it automatically turn off once you've turned it on as a means of controlling your energy. Pretty neat. Just wish it had fuller functionality via Alexa like Override schedule - etc.
customer_reviews.author: Gerkle

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: It didnt work with my system. Please note you need the C wire for this. I have to return
customer_reviews.author: I Am A Writer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Description states that it will work with Alexa, but instructions says it works with Siri. Father died in December and I had surgery in January, recovery in February. By the time we could install it, it was too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with Alexa. The sockets and lights may, but the thermostat does not work with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: s. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: must have C wire
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the trouble and remove your old thermostat before ordering, If you don't have a C wire, you'll need to run a new wire from your furnace/AC unit. Which for me is on the roof, a bigger job than I can handle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: First unit died just a month out of warranty had to buy another one unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lew

customer_reviews.title: nice thermostat
customer_reviews.text: works excellent after set up, now I can control temp and she doesn't know,,,,,,,,
customer_reviews.author: marvin simon

customer_reviews.title: Great Return Policy Saved the day
customer_reviews.text: I would have been pretty upset if I had spent the hours I did trying to make sure that I bought a product compatible with my home AC setup, only to find it was definitely not compatible; if the after-sale support & return process hand't been so great.
customer_reviews.author: Saint-John Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. Great with Apple HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Great with Apple HomeKit. Take some pictures prior to install and actually read the directions if you don't do this regularly. I know guys, instructions are for losers but it will help.
customer_reviews.author: The Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay "off" when instructed, wastes energy - the opposite of why I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay "Off" when set to "off". Very disappointed that the thing turned itself back on and blasted the furnace while I was on vacation. Did not respond from a remote location, not available in the home app or the idevices app. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love that I can adjust the temperature in my house whenever I am! I also like that iDevices is Apple HomeKit compatible. It was easy to install (did it myself). And easy to setup. Took less than 30 minutes from unboxing to operational!
customer_reviews.author: Lysandra G Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works great wit Apple HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: The iDevice thermostat works great with Apple Home Kit. It can be used with the iDevice app as a stand alone platform. Apple TV was utilized as the bridge to one app that controls all automation. Easy, straightforward thermostat. We did have to call during initial set and the support was prompt and knowledgeable.
customer_reviews.author: BarBGurl

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: Set up quick. Don’t hesitate to check out all the feature. I had to set it up for use without cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Beneath His Wings

customer_reviews.title: Working as describe on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Work great is the best thing ever for me right now i control it over my phone and alexa in and out the house also work great for the heat pump unit. Great customer service, they were very patient answering all my question.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonderful for a fraction of the cost of the other brands. I have 2 AC units and 2 of these work great together. The customer service is wonderful , I needed an extra part and they shipped me 2 for free ! I iwll stick with Idevices for the rest of my smart home needs !
customer_reviews.author: lyrical

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous reading the bad reviews, I did not have a C wire for my old thermostat, but there was an extra wire and hooked it up to the C power at the furnace. I also have an Android device and when I was setting it up it seemed to have issues, I used an iPhone and it worked perfectly. The thermostat did an upgrade and it was done. Setup was easy. I hooked it up to Alexa and it works perfectly. I would recommend this to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: James Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, I have not used it with Alexa, but so far no problems.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I have not used it with Alexa, but so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I use the app to control the thermostat from my phone. I can even control it when I'm out of state and out of the country! Just need wifi to the phone when out of the country.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Saves energy and so easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These thermostats work great. I did have trouble setting them up and called customer service and had a great experience with them and all works well.
customer_reviews.author: BSKearney

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: One of the few smart home devices I own which has never give me a “no response” message.
customer_reviews.author: LM1982

customer_reviews.title: Do need the C wire to use. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Had to go into system and find the C wire... since there was none, had to hard wire to a 24 volt source within the system. A but time consuming, but only because there was none in the first place. If you do have one then installation is a breeze... as they say. It’s been working great. Good affordable first entry product. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R. Díaz

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good start. But hoping it gets better.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because of a factory defect that they were aware of. Not sure why they did not recall the defective ones. Called customer service who were great and will send me a new one. Will update after I install the replacement. I installed the replacement and so far works great. Again the customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Hp

customer_reviews.title: Looses internet connection sometimes
customer_reviews.text: It's ok I guess ? It looses internet connect sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward  Popp

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermostat. We’ve been using it for a few weeks. I had an issue with installation but 3 emails solved the situation and set up was a breeze. The email response from iDevices was very fast and friendly. Recommend 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Open box and bodies not power on.
customer_reviews.text: Open box item. There was a hair inside the unit. The unit does not power on. Not happy. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ho

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price.
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation and excellent tech support. Very simple easy to use software. I had an issue with thermostat not working. They honor their product replaced thermostat. new one works great. Tech people are awesome
customer_reviews.author: CRaig

customer_reviews.title: Zero support with promised fix
customer_reviews.text: I talked to iDevices about their product. I was assured that a software fix for auxiliary gas heat would make the device compatable with their system. The upgrade was never made. No way to get my money back. iDevices support is just dumb list readers. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else. Not this!
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. First unit grenaded at 4 months and second unit grenaded within 2 months. I bought two units. Units would just give up the ghost and not turn on. Now I’m going Ecobee.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius DeSouza

customer_reviews.title: but setup and WiFi setting was easy and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat works well but not with certain furnaces. I could only get the heat to work, but setup and WiFi setting was easy and it works great. Wishing I would’ve had an updated furnace for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to use this for the Alexa or control by cell phone coolness that it offers, and you're on Apple - you MUST CONNECT IT TO APPLE HOME FIRST. It was easy to install but the instructions for digital hookup stink. Remember-find it through Apple home first and then it's a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: To good to be true
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work, kept trying to send a signal to both the heat and the cooling systems at the same time until it would blow the system out.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Landau

customer_reviews.title: Very poor
customer_reviews.text: Won’t keep a WiFi connection for more than a hour or so, also no memory between heat and cool. A no go for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 12 weeks. Glitched up and randomly turns off. Idevices won't honor the warranty sold through this seller. Just out a hundred bucks.
customer_reviews.author: MDR

customer_reviews.title: check your wires first - requires 24v power
customer_reviews.text: like it, but couldn't use it because I did not have a 24v blue wire for power.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hayes

customer_reviews.title: I would but something else
customer_reviews.text: Connection issue and poor interface are the biggest issues with these thermostats. Once they are set they certainly work but you may as well buy any old thermostat since you usually have to walk up to them and adjust anyway. Wifi is not an issue at all in my home yet these things never seem to stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love that i can control my heat setting while on my way home on a snowy day.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: Works with HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: Works well with the Apple HomeKit but the functions are kind of limited
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Almost good
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because every time you want to turn on A/C, or heater you have to wait (not sure 5 or 15 min) I understand if its on auto why it will do that, but if I want AC on I had to wait. Could have done it manually which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The thermostat didn’t work and I tried to return it
customer_reviews.text: The product didn’t work was installed worked for a minute never turn the air conditioner on Or that he would only turn the fan on
customer_reviews.author: David Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple. Works great with our heat pump / furnace / AC
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wade

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to setup and get going. I purchased this one because it works with alexa, and that was also easy to setup. Works great, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: chrisquinn13

customer_reviews.title: We bought 2 of these 'refurbished'. 1 needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these 'refurbished'. 1 needed to be sent back. Sometimes the devices it works with are 'not connected', but it mostly works well
customer_reviews.author: Erik de Perik

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Won’t hook up to phone. CSR blames it on my Ihome app not working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Buy, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermostat works as described, very simple and easy to use even easier if you use it with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I spent 4 hours trying to install it with help online, then spent $82.00 for a repairman to come out and discover that the product was defective. Returned it for refund of $75.
customer_reviews.author: skip

customer_reviews.title: WOW this is the best deal going
customer_reviews.text: Oh, WOW this is the best deal going. Works great and half the price of any other!
customer_reviews.author: 4Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: easy install and ok set up
customer_reviews.text: easy for any tech novice, not for your grand mother. works great through Alexa
customer_reviews.author: eric swanson

customer_reviews.title: Really works with HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. It really does work with ease with HomeKit ! In less then 10 mins I was up and running . This is the best value as a HomeKit user .
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Will buy more iDevices products!
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to control my thermostat from my phone. Occasionally the app doesn't communicate with the thermostat and you have to manually make a change.
customer_reviews.author: Kingfish

customer_reviews.title: Not good wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for 5 minutes then would not connect anymore
customer_reviews.author: Ted Urdahl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Works great with Homekit
customer_reviews.text: Works very good! Excellent connection with Homekit. It will pay for itself in a few months! Highly reccomended.
customer_reviews.author: Greilys Lazcano

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good unit but....
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have the 220 control wire you can't use it without some expert help - I ended up buying a Nest, 5 minute install and integration with my Simplisafe system.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great installation fairly easy.
customer_reviews.text: Product works fine with Alexa. As with other products of this type you have to have another app installed to work with it. Installation was fairly quick and easy with the exception of needing to know what type of HVAC system you have.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Tech. Support
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat works great. Besdt customer service/tech. support I've encountered with any company.
customer_reviews.author: Ed E

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money and tech support was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Russo

customer_reviews.title: Item was shipped and received
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat was not compatible with the wiring in my home. Can't use the item at all
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA M

customer_reviews.title: Finally had the thermostat installed professionally and it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally had the thermostat installed professionally and it does not work. I don't know what can be done at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Darren J Foreaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It was super easy to install and setup. Works great with apple HomeKit.
customer_reviews.author: Segev Amit

customer_reviews.title: devices work well.
customer_reviews.text: devices worked well...sometime refresh of devices on network takes a minute or so. and this is on a very strong network.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have
customer_reviews.text: Love having the ability to manage the heat from afar. The app used is updated and stays relevant.
customer_reviews.author: sor

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. It doesn’t fit flush with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It doesn’t fit flush with the wall but I’m going to go with the wall isn’t square.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Greenway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It works flawlessly with Apple Home kit. Easy setup and huge potential with future updates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really neat concept. Going to have to return. ...
customer_reviews.text: Really neat concept. Going to have to return. Really isn't compatible with wiring on "older" homes. Lol. Would have to have a pro install or buy an adapter. Wish they would have said before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't control the fan via Siri. Very basic. Huge delay between thermostat and HVAC system. Update: Now there is fan control via iDevices app, but response has been limited lately. So I'd add and take away a star. Update 9/4/17: My iPhone app works to control the thermostat 20% of the time. I took away a star.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Did not have issues as other mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Only challenge was to connect an unconnected wire (blue-C) to the furnance, which was clearly indicated in the AC manual. Updated the firmware, set it up and has been working fine for months. No dissconnection. In order to make it work over the internet, there were aditional steps, but i called support and they explained me that i had to enable some parameters in my icloud account.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: iDevices customer service very poor to work with and basically said I was on ...
customer_reviews.text: Never could get it to connect to Android devices even after jumping through hoops to get an iphone for a SW upgrade to the product. Returned unit and got a Honeywell thermostat to talk to Alexa. iDevices customer service very poor to work with and basically said I was on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Gholst

product_meta.title: iDevices IDEV0005AND5 FBA_2843481 Wi-Fi Smart Thermostat, Works with Alexa, White
product_meta.description: Ensure comfort and control with the iDevices Thermostat. Use dynamic scheduling to save money on energy costs and improve your home’s efficiency. The iDevices Thermostat is compatible with most heating and cooling systems and is designed to fit the aesthetics of any home with its standard size, shape and modern look.HVAC Compatibility:Heating: 1 and 2 Stages (W1, W2),Cooling: 1 and 2 Stages (Y1, Y2),Heat Pump: 1 and 2 stage with Aux or Emergency Heat (O/B, Aux/E),Fan Control: G,Humidification and Dehumidification,Power: C (required), RH, RC,Converts to Fahrenheit or Celsius.
feature_bullets: COMPATIBILITY: Works with most heating and cooling systems; all systems require a 24VAC "Common" wire for power. All system types require a common wire (C-Wire). To check system and router compatibility, refer to iDevices support portal
VOICE CONTROL: Responds to Alexa, Siri, and Google Assistant voice commands (voice assistant devices sold separately)
ACCESS ANYWHERE: Control and monitor the iDevices Thermostat from anywhere using any iOS/Android device and the iDevices Connected app

NO HUB REQUIRED: With the iDevices Thermostat, a home Wi-Fi network and a smart phone/tablet are all that's required to get started. For additional compatibility details, refer to the iDevices support portal
2-YEAR WARRANTY: Backed by a 2-year limited warranty and U.S.-based customer experience team

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
